<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"priceDeposit"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/priceDeposit"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

**DEPRECATED**: This endpoint is deprecated. Please use time-based recurring orders instead.

Request for a base64-encoded unsigned price-based recurring order deposit transaction to be used in `POST /recurring/v1/execute`

:::note
- Refer to [Recurring API doc](/docs/recurring-api/deposit-price-order) for more information
:::


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","deprecated":true,"description":"DEPRECATED: Price-based recurring orders are deprecated","required":["user","order","amount"],"properties":{"amount":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0},"order":{"type":"string","description":"Base-58 account which is the Recurring Order account"},"user":{"type":"string"}},"title":"DepositPriceRecurring"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Deposit transaction created successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["requestId","transaction"],"properties":{"requestId":{"type":"string","description":"Required to make a request to `/execute`"},"transaction":{"type":"string","description":"Unsigned base-64 encoded transaction"}},"title":"RecurringResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
